name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-travel-itinerary
title: Travel Itinerary Creator Prompt
shortDescription: This AI Builder prompt generates personalized travel itineraries based on destinations, dates, interests, and obligations
longDescription: Generates personalized travel itineraries based on destinations, dates, interests, and obligations

metadata.value: Create a travel itinerary for my trip from [Origin] to [Destination]. I'll be traveling from [Start Date] to [End Date]. My interests include [Interests], and I have the following obligations: [Obligations]. Please suggest a daily itinerary that incorporates sightseeing, dining, and leisure activities.
